snippet.title: A.W. : Phoenix Festa – PS Vita – Available Now!
snippet.description:
Download A.W. Phoenix Festa for PS Vita now: https://store.playstation.com/#!/cid=EP0700-PCSB00960_00-ASTERISK00000000

Participate in the Phoenix Festa tournament and fight with your chosen partner for supremacy! 

Enjoy the story mode twice embodying the main character Ayato or integrating the academy with your own customized character. Choose your own actions and discover a multi-end adventure with love romance results. Whether you choose to fight against the CPU, to beat your own score during survival missions, or to challenge your friends through the ad-hoc mode, train hard to win the tournament!
